title: 91/608/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 November 1991 amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 12 November 1991  amending Decision 86/473/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Uruguay approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community  (91/608/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/473/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 November 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 69. (3) OJ No L 279, 30. 9. 1986, p. 53. (4) OJ No L 228, 15. 8. 1987, p. 45.
